info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:31AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...CAUTIOUS TRAVEL IS ADVISED FOR LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL... WEATHER... * A line of heavy showers will slowly drift southeast through portions of metro Detroit through the late morning hours. Portions of I-96, I-275, M-39, M-10, I-94, and I-75 can expect impacts from these heavy showers. * Rainfall rates briefly approaching 1 inch per hour at times will be possible before activity gradually wanes and diminishes heading into the early afternoon hours. IMPACTS... * Significant ponding on area roadways will be possible where the heaviest rainfall occurs. Low-lying portions of freeways may experience a greater risk. * Localized heavy rainfall may result in variable and reduced visibility for motorists. && PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... * Reduced visibilities and ponding of water on roadways may lead to variable traffic rates. Motorists are urged to use caution and account for variable driving conditions by slowing down and allowing extra time. * Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP
